faq.question: Will Regenera leave scars?
faq.answer: Punch sites are only 2-3mm and heal invisibly within a week. They're placed behind the ear in areas covered by hair, so virtually undetectable.
Expect thicker strands and new baby hairs between weeks 6-10, with full density improvement by month 6. Results continue building for up to 12 months.
faq.question: How soon will I see Regenera results?
How much does Regenera hair treatment cost?
faq.answer: Regenera Core (single session + PRP booster) is £2,250. Regenera Elite with exosome fusion is £2,850. Consultation fee (£100) is credited toward treatment. 0% finance available.

faq.question: Does Regenera hurt?
faq.answer: We use local anaesthetic at both the donor site and scalp injection sites. Most patients report mild pressure rather than pain. The procedure is very tolerable.

faq.question: How long do Regenera results last?
faq.answer: Results typically last 18-24 months. Many patients add quarterly PRP boosters to extend benefits. You can repeat Regenera treatment as needed for ongoing maintenance.

faq.question: Is Regenera better than PRP for hair loss?
faq.answer: Regenera is more potent than PRP as it delivers actual progenitor cells plus growth factors and matrix proteins. It's ideal when PRP alone hasn't achieved desired results, or for advanced thinning. Many patients combine both for maximum impact.

faq.question: How many Regenera sessions do I need?
faq.answer: Most patients achieve excellent results with a single Regenera session plus an optional PRP booster at 6 weeks. Unlike PRP which requires multiple sessions, Regenera's potency means one treatment goes a long way.

faq.question: Can I combine Regenera with other hair treatments?
faq.answer: Yes, Regenera works synergistically with PRP and exosome therapy. Many patients continue using minoxidil or finasteride alongside. Dr Abbas will design your optimal combination protocol.

bodyLocation: Donor site (behind ear or occipital region)
schema.howPerformed: Under local anesthetic, we take 2-3 tiny skin samples (2-3mm punch biopsies) from the hair-rich area behind your ear—a zone genetically resistant to hair loss. These micro-grafts are immediately processed in the Regenera® medical device, which mechanically breaks down the tissue into a cellular suspension rich in progenitor cells, growth factors, and extracellular matrix. This takes about 10 minutes. We then inject this potent mixture across your thinning areas using fine needles. The entire procedure takes 90 minutes
schema.preparation: Wash your hair the morning of treatment. Eat a good meal beforehand. Stop blood-thinning supplements for one week. Avoid alcohol 48 hours before. Come with realistic expectations—Regenera works best for diffuse thinning, not complete baldness. Bring a hat to wear home if you prefer. Relax knowing your own cells are doing the heavy lifting
schema.followup: Tiny punch sites behind your ear heal within 5-7 days and become virtually invisible. Injection sites on scalp may be slightly tender for 24-48 hours. Don't wash hair for 24 hours. Avoid intense exercise, swimming, and saunas for 3 days. No hair coloring or harsh treatments for 2 weeks. Optional PRP booster at 6 weeks enhances results. Temporary increased shedding at weeks 2-4 is normal (follicles resetting)—new growth follows
schema.outcome: New baby hairs typically appear around 6-10 weeks. Existing thin hairs become thicker and stronger. Hair density measurably improves over 3-6 months. Scalp feels healthier. The potency is impressive—combining stem-cell-rich tissue with growth factors and matrix proteins. Results last 18-24 months. Many patients combine with PRP or exosomes for accelerated, dramatic regrowth
schema.medicationRequired: Local anesthetic for donor site punch biopsies and scalp injections
schema.treatmentFrequency: Single treatment session with optional PRP booster at 6 weeks. Many patients repeat Regenera every 18-24 months or layer with quarterly PRP maintenance
schema.adverseOutcome: Mild tenderness at donor and injection sites for 24-48 hours. Small scabs at punch sites (heal within week). Temporary increased shedding weeks 2-4 (normal reset phase). Rare: small visible scar at donor site (typically hidden by hair)

longDescription: Regenera® takes a tiny skin sample from the scalp’s strongest follicles, mechanically processes it, and injects the micro-graft suspension into thinning zones. Each graft contains stem-cell-rich tissue, extracellular matrix, and growth factors that trigger dormant follicles, improve density, and nourish the scalp environment. It’s the go-to when you want more potency than PRP but aren’t ready for transplant surgery.
